name: Experienced Services
objective: To enable the agency to work with select NGOs to fill a wide variety of temporary human resource needs with skilled, experienced workers, aged 55 and older, while also providing opportunities to qualified older Americans to have meaningful work and fair wages.

results.description: Four applications were received for the over-arching program agreements, and 2 agreements were awarded; 18 project agreements were awarded under these over-arching agreements, at the request of the agency.

authorizations.text: Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024 —Department of the Interior Experienced Services Program (Pub. L. 118-42 [H.R. 4366-222]).
